text: Ettore Francesco Maria Bassi (born April 16, 1970) is an Italian actor and television presenter. In 2010, it was announced that he is the successor of Kaspar Capparoni in the German-Austrian-Italian thriller series Inspector Rex. ==Other websites== * Sito ufficiale di Ettore Bassi * Category:1970 births Category:Italian television presenters Category:Actors from Bari Category:Living people
title: Ettore Bassi
